project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a specified CSV file, calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns selected by the user.

task.name: Implement mean calculation for specified numerical columns
Implement median calculation for specified numerical columns
Implement mode calculation for specified numerical columns
Create user interface for selecting numerical columns
Write tests for the calculations and CSV reading functionality
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
